comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Thomas Lansing Masson, born 1866, died 1934. A humorist, also an editor of anthologies of American humorous writing. [The old Life was a humor magazine.] His 1914 publication (the year of this photo) was titled "The Best Stories in the World." A 1922 reprint of the work is available online through Google Books: books.google.com/books?id=dc9aaaaayaaj&printsec=front... A page about Masson, with a photo, from the internet: ronevry.com/masson.html

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: rjones0856 and Wystan:  Thanks for providing Masson's full name.  We'll add it to the description next time we update.
